org.hibernate.boot.jaxb.internal.stax

Class LocalSchemaLocator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hibernate.boot.jaxb.internal.stax.LocalSchemaLocator

  • public class LocalSchemaLocator
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper for resolving XML Schema references locally.

    Note that *by design* we always use our ClassLoader to perform the lookups here.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      static javax.xml.validation.Schema resolveLocalSchema(java.net.URL schemaUrl) 
      static java.net.URL resolveLocalSchemaUrl(java.lang.String schemaResourceName)
      Given the resource name of a schema, locate its URL reference via ClassLoader lookup.
